title: Supplice is a new retro-FPS made by Doom modders, and it really feels like old-school Doom
description: Supplice is now available on Steam.

title: Blizzard fixes Overwatch 2 'bug' that it purposefully added in 2019
description: An awkward, but relatable crossing of wires at Overwatch HQ.

title: World's best chess player loses tournament due to 'horror mouseslip'
description: Magnus Carlsen lost to rival Hikaru Nakamura after misclicking his queen.

title: The Last of Us on Steam finally gets its first big patch, but it still has the jitters
description: Early reaction to the first big update is mixed—some people are seeing real improvements, others say nothing has changed.

title: I can't believe this keeps happening: leaked Ukraine War plans spread in part through a Minecraft Discord server
description: Will we ever learn to not leak classified military intelligence on gaming forums? The answer, it seems, is no.

title: Call of Duty's next season might actually make everyone happy
description: Season 3 is a big one for both Warzone 2 and Modern Warfare 2.

title: In this 'inverse city builder' the island you're building on is slowly shrinking
description: In Flooded, the ocean is steadily rising, and you need to harvest the shrinking island's resources before it's completely swallowed.

title: Take-Two dismisses lawsuit against Grand Theft Auto modders
description: The lawsuit was originally filed in 2021 over the reverse-engineered re3 and reVC versions of GTA3 and Vice City.

title: Sons of the Forest's latest patch notes are more disturbing than I expected
description: The electric unicycle is fine, but was baby buoyancy really necessary?

title: Samsung cuts chip production as profits implode
description: Analysts reckon the move could push prices up. Yikes.

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake gets microtransaction DLC that lets you pay to upgrade your guns
F.E.A.R. inspired shooter Trepang2 blasts onto Steam this June
description: Date reveal trailer shows off the game's glossy, gory action.

title: Nvidia's RTX 4070 is unofficially official but still hasn't actually been announced
description: Next-gen GPU pops up in Nvidia's slide on Reflex performance in Counter-Strike 2.

title: Nvidia's low-latency Reflex tech will give older GPUs a boost in Counter-Strike 2
description: You'll need an Nvidia graphics card to benefit, but Reflex will have the biggest impact on older GPUs.

title: Half-Life 2: Episode Two gets modded VR support, making Valve's sequel completely playable in virtual reality
description: See those hunters up close and personal.

title: Resident Evil 4 Remake's Mercenaries mode is available to play now
description: Downloadable via Steam as free DLC.
